original_text: The black horses which are therein go forth into the north country; and the white go forth after them; and the grisled go forth toward the south country.
korean_text: 검은 말은 북쪽 땅으로 나가고 흰 말은 그 뒤를 따르고 어룽진 말은 남쪽 땅으로 나가고

sentences.original_text: The black horses which are therein
go forth into the north country
and the white go forth after them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 흰 말들은 그들의 뒤를 따라 나아간다

sentences.original_text: and the grisled go forth toward the south country
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 얼룩말들은 남쪽 나라를 향하여 나아간다
